Dec. 2, 1922 D Northern Band Association (Second Section)
Northern Band Association (Second Section) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
northern-band-association-second-section
None
City Hall, Newcastle-upon-Tyne Prizes - 1st £10 and shield, 2nd £6, 3rd £4, 4th £3, 5th £2. 7 bands competed.
Oct. 13, 2018, 8:56 p.m. Oct. 13, 2018, 9 p.m.
